scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:js
scripts.build:js: tsup src/index.ts src/renderer.ts --format esm --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json && node ../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir dist esmEntry=index.js rendererEntry=renderer.js
scripts.build:test: node ../../scripts/guard-prod-build.mjs packages/core && tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && tsup src/index.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinCore --sourcemap --target es2020 --outDir ../../devdist/core/iife --external=none && node ../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir ../../devdist/core esmEntry=index.js rendererEntry=renderer.js iifeEntry=iife/index.global.js
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --watch --emitDeclarationOnly" "tsup src/index.ts src/renderer.ts --format esm --watch --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json"
scripts.test: node ../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/core/tests && PLAYWRIGHT_TSCONFIG=../../tsconfig.playwright.json TS_BUILD_TARGET=dev playwright test --config=../../playwright.config.ts packages/core/tests --reporter=list
